meanings.definition: To represent in a picture or painting.
meanings.sent1: She depaints the beautiful scenery with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent2: The artist depaints the sunset on canvas with skillful strokes.
meanings.sent3: His attempt to depaint the cat as a dog in the painting led to a humorous mix-up.
meanings.sent4: The way she depaints emotions on the canvas is like capturing feelings in a bottle.
meanings.sent5: The artist depaints the essence of nature in every stroke, making the artwork come alive.

meanings.definition: To describe or portray in words.
meanings.sent1: The author depaints the protagonist as a brave hero in the novel.
meanings.sent2: She depaints the scene with vivid language, bringing it to life for the readers.
meanings.sent3: His attempt to depaint the situation as a comedy of errors made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her words depaint a world of magic and wonder, transporting readers to new realms.
meanings.sent5: The poet depaints love in all its forms, from gentle whispers to fierce passions.
